section:
You get talking to the captain of a small sloop, who tells you that he will take you as far as Marlock City for 5 Shards. Another ship is sailing for Dweomer, and passage aboard that will cost 8 Shards. You can pay the fare and set sail, or stay in Wishport a while longer.
Set sail for Dweomer Set sail for Marlock City Don’t put to sea yet
